body_html:
I apologize, but I don't quite understand the issue here. Could you provide the full stack trace?

Also, a side observation, the first line in construct_dataset seems unnecessary, since the very next line ignores it and creates a new Dataset using from_tensor_slices?

body:
I apologize, but I don't quite understand the issue here. Could you provide the full stack trace?

Also, a side observation, the first line in `construct_dataset` seems unnecessary, since the very next line ignores it and creates a new `Dataset` using `from_tensor_slices`?
